headline.main: VICTORY FOR CHINA SEEN WITH U.S. AID; Labor Leader Here Says One Month's Output of Weapons Could Turn Tide in '42

lead_paragraph: If the United States will send to China "one month's production" of tanks and planes, China can defeat Japan in 1942, thereby releasing for the battle against Hitlerism the tremendous British, American, Australian, Indian and Russian forces held in the Pacific by the existence of an unconquered Japan, according to Chu Hsueh-fan, president of the Chinese Association of Labor.
abstract: R Richard lauds N Y C League of Women Voters work for act support

keywords.name: organizations
